resources.string: \"One of the oldest quality local restaurants in Larisa. It serves Local cuisine, Barbecue dishes and Mediterranean cuisine\".
\"Placed on the fortress area of Larisa, with an old cinematic design, it offers a taste of old Greek times, and traditional culinary cuisine.\"
\"Modern design, fast service and tasty culinary dishes are the main qualities of the restaurant. Having a dinner, a bar and an exquisite garden.\"
\"With an exquisite view by the river of Larisa, great dishes and live music, it\'s certainly the place someone needs to visit while being on Larisa.\"
\"The place to taste every Greek Wine there is, and also to taste great dishes with the company of good music and awesome-quick service.\"
\"Just above Larisa\'s main square, with a view from the height of a 5th floor, Epicure 5 is a classy restaurant everyone should enjoy eating in it.\"
\"Featuring Italian cuisine, and Mediterranean dishes, tasteful hot beverages and a warm atmosphere, this is certainly the place to go for a relaxing experience.\"
\"One of the oldest traditional restaurants in Larisa, it offers a wide variety of dishes with reasonable prices, live music, and of course a warm and kind atmosphere.\"
\"The ancient theater of Larisa is probably the best attraction for someone to visit. I\'ts well preserved through the years, and certainly worth visiting.\"
\"The #2 Ancient Theater of Larisa, or the little Ancient Theater, is the place where all the rehearsals and children performances took place.\"
\"The Diachronic Museum of Larisa presents on it\'s visitors the history of Larisa throughout the last 10.000 years. It\'s well organized and totally fascinating.\"
\"Pinios River is a big river that passes through the city of Larisa separating the ⅓ of the city from the rest of it. Truly a remarkable sight!\"
\"The Municipal Art Gallery brings together many famous and beautiful works of art and it\'s a remarkable cultural Center very much worth the while of it\'s visitors.\"
\"If interested in Larisa\'s culture, someone needs to visit the Folklore Historical Museum which hosts the local history of the city.\"

For those who want to try something new for a change, Las Ramblas is the place for you. They grow and make their own unique coffee and have a wide variety of breakfasts, lunches and dinners for those who can\'t stand drinking coffee whithout being full.

It is placed on the most busy sidewalk of Larisa and it carries the 20 year old fame if has since it opened. A lot of people enjoy having their coffee there and since it\'s usually full, they don\'t mind to wait for a bit to take a seat. Their coffee is top notch and surely it worths having it there.

Warm atmosphere, crowdy sidewalk and fast service are the main conductors of this cafe. It is split in half on both ways of the sidewalk so that it contains more space to let their customers be at as much ease as possible. Probably it worth visiting after a long walk at Larisa\'s shops.

This cafe is both a cafe and a cocktail bar. One can enjoy his coffee up until noon and then switch to a refreshing cocktail whenever feels ready. It\'s central location and comfortable seats makes it a most suitable place for anyone visiting the city of Larisa.
It is a brand new cafe so there is NO AVAILABLE DESCRIPTION
A description is not necessary here, whoever wants to find out how it is, must just visit it.
